title: Media school
brief_description: A report on a course in communications with a group of 16 year-old boys from Melbourne High School. The media school is residential and the experiences range through music, mass media and personal relationships. An important featujre is the free open approachto life in general. Made as a segment for the ABC’s “This Day Tonight” program.
